body:
the sound of people shooting off leftover fireworks

the surprisingly great side kale salad at the hot chicken place (also the hot chicken)

i stopped miso from eating a dead bird on our walk

it's not supposed to rain until this afternoon, so i'll get to go running this morning

the feeling of stretching out your body when first getting out of bed in the morning
